H0.text: where is the fukushima daiichi nuclear power station. South Korea

H2.text: where is the fukushima daiichi nuclear power station. Taiwan

H3.text: where is the fukushima daiichi nuclear power station. Japan

A4.text: The Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant (福島第一原子力発電所, Fukushima Daiichi Genshiryoku Hatsudensho; Fukushima number 1 nuclear power plant) is a disabled nuclear power plant located on a 350‑hectare (860‑acre) site in the towns of Ōkuma and Futaba in Fukushima Prefecture, Japan.

A5.text: The plant suffered major damage from the magnitude 9.1 earthquake and tsunami that hit Japan on March 11, 2011.
